hackeRnews 0.2.1
  • Reference
    • HackeRnews - specification
  • Changelog

Hacker News latest ask stories

Source: R/api.R
get_latest_ask_stories.Rd

Retrieves latest ask stories using Hacker News API

Usage

get_latest_ask_stories(max_items = NULL)

Arguments

max_items

Maximum number of items to retrieve. If max_items = NULL, returns all available

Value

list of latest ask HN stories ids

Examples


# \donttest{
# get the lastest ask story on Hacker News
latest_ask_story <- get_latest_ask_stories(max_items = 1)
latest_ask_story
#> [[1]]
#> List of 9
#>  $ by         : chr "salestoscale"
#>  $ descendants: int 34
#>  $ id         : int 43584547
#>  $ kids       : int [1:21] 43585926 43585437 43584867 43586188 43585903 43587161 43585333 43586129 43585925 43586859 ...
#>  $ score      : int 28
#>  $ text       : chr "I recently launched an independent sales agency specializing in early-stage startups.  My model is adapted from"| __truncated__
#>  $ time       : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2025-04-04 16:15:48"
#>  $ title      : chr "Ask HN: As a Founder, is this business model compelling?"
#>  $ type       : chr "story"
#>  - attr(*, "class")= chr "hn_item"
#>
